name: CABGOrPCIProcedure
title: CABG or PCI Procedure
description: Mathematica assumed stewardship on 2/15/23 from Change Healthcare.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: CABG, PCI Procedure),(Data Element Scope: CABG, PCI Procedure),(Inclusion Criteria: ),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

concept.display: Percutaneous transcatheter placement of drug eluting intracoronary stent(s), with coronary angioplasty when performed; single major coronary artery or branch
